title: Nintendo Goes Hard On Their September Direct - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.05.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/GAMES now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Get 15% off your order at http://buyraycon.com/KFGAMES. 

Imran and former Game Informer editor Suriel Vasquez cover Nintendo’s new Direct, Ikumi Nakamura leaving Ghostwire: Tokyo, and “heated gamer moments.”

Time stamps - 
00:01:30 - Cereal Time
00:07:55 - Housekeeping
It’s Thursday, and that means there’s a new Party Mode on YouTube.com/kindafunnygames. This week, Chloe Dykstra and Cameron Cuffe join the boys and get SUPER-irritated in a game of Ultimate Chicken Horse.
Friday night, Greg and Fran are hosting the Borderlands 3 Launch Party from Dallas. Watch with the Best Friends on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames at 5 p.m. PT!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
http://www.patreon.com/ReRetroGames
Black Jack
Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:09:09 - September 4th Nintendo Direct - Me
00:23:10 Best Friend Q. -  Super Smash Bros Ultimate DLC, comfirming that they will expand the DLC offering past the original 'fighters pass' into the future. Do you think that Nintendo and Samurai can essentially lay claim to anyone they see fit? - LegendOfKanto
00:37:24 - Ikumi Nakamura Departs GhostWire: Tokyo Studio - IGN by Joseph Knoop and Matt Kim
00:42:34 - Popular Fortnite streamer Tfue used a racial slur in a stream, then deleted it - PCGamer by Jody Macgregor
00:51:18 - Cult director Ben Wheatley to direct Tomb Raider 2 - Deadline by Mike Fleming Jr.
00:53:00 - Out today
00:56:06 -  THIRDLOVE
00:58:00 -  RAYCON
Reader mail   -
00:59:47 - What your thoughts are on the amount of fighters in smash. Is there such a thing as too many fighters? - Billythedoor
01:03:30 - How do you go about covering a game conference? - Lewis
01:05:32 - Squad Up: Alec Bobko(PSN) - Albob875
01:05:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Imran Khan and  Javy Gwaltney
GAMESCAST: Thursday, September 5th @ 2 p.m.
Imran, Suriel, Javy
